attributes.action: Acknowledge that "climate change" is NOT due to humans and is a natural occurrence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The theory that we could possibly affect, control or even understand something as complex as the environment is gross stupidity. This "belief" will come to be viewed as ridiculous as the earth being flat. I want it acknowledged that mankind’s role in climate change is overstated and not proven.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
